SELECT u.user_id , u.user_name , u.fintech_use_num , u.tranDTime , f.access_token , f.user_seq_no , fund.cost , fund.status
, CAST(fund.idx AS char(10)) as fundIdx FROM user_fund_info u JOIN fintech_user_info f ON u.user_id = f.id JOIN fund fund ON u.user_id = fund.user_id WHERE u.project_code = #{project_code}

select project_code , title , creator , date_format(DATE_ADD(end_date, INTERVAL 1 day), '%Y-%m-%d') as payment_date , (select SUM(cost) from fund f where p.project_code = f.project_code) as total_cost From project p WHERE now() BETWEEN end_date and DATE_ADD(end_date, INTERVAL 8 day) AND goal_amount <= (select SUM(cost) from fund f where p.project_code = f.project_code)

select p.project_code , title , creator , date_format(DATE_ADD(end_date, INTERVAL 1 day), '%Y-%m-%d') as payment_date , (select SUM(cost) from fund f where p.project_code = f.project_code AND status = "결제성공") as total_cost , TRUNCATE((select (SUM(cost) - (SUM(cost) * 0.088)) from fund f where p.project_code = f.project_code AND status = "결제성공"), 0) as real_cost From project p JOIN creator_account ca ON p.project_code = ca.project_code WHERE now() BETWEEN DATE_ADD(end_date, INTERVAL 8 day) and DATE_ADD(end_date, INTERVAL 15 day) AND goal_amount <= (select SUM(cost) from fund f where p.project_code = f.project_code) AND ca.status = "입금대기"

SELECT ca.user_id , ca.user_name , ca.fintech_use_num , f.access_token
FROM creator_account ca JOIN fintech_user_info f ON ca.user_id = f.id WHERE ca.project_code = #{project_code}
